addins.rmd

RStudio Add-ins for R Markdown

rmd_format_bold() rmd_format_italics() rmd_format_bold_italics() rmd_format_bold2() rmd_format_italics2() rmd_code_inline() rmd_code_inline_r() rmd_code_inline_highlighted_as_r() rmd_format_superscript() rmd_format_subscript() rmd_format_strikethrough() rmd_format_footnote() rmd_horizontal_rule() rmd_link_url() rmd_insert_figure() rmd_insert_figure_r_code_block() rmd_symbol_asterisk() rmd_symbol_backslash() rmd_symbol_underscore() rmd_symbol_dollar() rmd_symbol_en_dash() rmd_symbol_em_dash()

Add-ins for basic R Markdown formatting.

rmd_code_block_r() rmd_code_block() rmd_code_block_r_split()

Convert rows into the block of code.

rmd_equation_a_inline() rmd_equation_b_block() rmd_equation_b_block2()

Format as LaTeX equation.

rmd_heading_1() rmd_heading_2() rmd_heading_3() rmd_heading_4() rmd_heading_5() rmd_heading_6() rmd_heading_1_title() rmd_heading_2_subtitle() rmd_heading_remove()

rmd_list() rmd_block_quotes() rmd_line_blocks() rmd_list_unordered() rmd_list_unordered_2() rmd_list_numbered() rmd_list_numbered_2() rmd_list_lettered() rmd_list_lettered_2() rmd_list_z_example_list()

Format text as R Markdown list.

Remove list-like formatting
